content.rendered:
Our Offerings

Luxury Hand Care

Gel polish adds $20 and includes a 1-week guarantee on natural nails.

Essential Manicure
$25

An essential manicure with trimming, shaping, filing, cuticle care, and a soothing hand massage with lotion. Relax further with a hot towel to refresh and rejuvenate your hands. Optional polish application included.


For Silver to Royal: Choose from Lavender or Honey Pearl for Scrub & Masque.

Silver Serenity Manicure
$35

Silky, hydrated hands await. Enjoy an Essential Manicure with a deeply exfoliating sugar scrub, an organic hydration masque treatment, and a relaxing 5-minute massage.

Gold Glow Manicure
$39

Pamper your hands with the ultimate care. Essential Manicure featuring a revitalizing sugar scrub for gentle exfoliation, a luxurious paraffin wax treatment, and a soothing 7 massage.

Platinum Bliss Manicure
$45

Unveil irresistibly soft, radiant hands with luxurious hydration. Essential Manicure featuring a gentle sugar scrub, an organic hydration masque, a soothing paraffin treatment, and a calming 10-minute massage.

Diamond Indulgence Manicure
$49

Transform your hands with deep exfoliation, intense hydration, and lasting nourishment. Essential Manicure enhanced with a rejuvenating sugar scrub, an organic hydration masque, soothing paraffin treatment, revitalizing hot stone therapy, and a luxurious 10-minute massage.

La Jolla Shores Royal Manicure
$59

Restore youthful vitality to your hands with anti-aging care, deep exfoliation, and lasting nourishment. Essential Manicure enhanced with a rejuvenating sugar scrub, a collagen-infused treatment for deep hydration and anti-aging benefits, soothing paraffin treatment, revitalizing hot stone therapy, and a luxurious 15-minute massage.

💅✨ Ultimate Pampering Deal! ✨💅

Treat your hands and feet to perfection with our Manicure & Pedicure Combos, now with an irresistible 5% OFF!

Enjoy the perfect blend of relaxation and beauty while saving big. 🌟 Let your nails shine and your feet feel refreshed with this luxurious combo offer!

Elegant Foot Care

Gel polish adds $20 and includes a 1-week guarantee on natural nails.

Essential Pedicure
$35

Enjoy a soothing foot soak, expert cuticle care, nail trimming, scrubbing of the heels, and a lotion massage, followed by calming hot towel care to relax and rejuvenate, finished with your choice of polish or a natural look.

Silver Serenity Pedicure
$39

Unveil beautifully renewed feet with deep, luxurious hydration. Essential pedicure enhanced with a gentle sugar scrub, a rejuvenating hydrating masque, and a soothing 7-minute massage.

Gold Glow Pedicure
$55

The ultimate care for refreshed, nourished, and radiant feet. Enjoy all the benefits of our Essential Pedicure, elevated with a soothing sea salt soak to relax and detoxify, expert callus care to smooth and soften, and a gentle sugar scrub to exfoliate and rejuvenate. Replenish with a collagen-infused masque, then indulge in a 10-minute massage with rich body butter for lasting hydration and a healthy, radiant glow.

Platinum Bliss Pedicure
$59

The exceptional care for hydrated, rejuvenated, and beautifully refreshed feet. Enjoy all the benefits of our Essential Pedicure, elevated with refreshing sea salt soak to relax and renew, a gentle sugar scrub to exfoliate and refresh, and a rejuvenating collagen masque to deeply hydrate. Complete the experience with nourishing paraffin wax, rich buttery cream, and a 15-minute relaxing massage for silky smooth, revitalized feet.

✨ Scent Collection For Gold & Platinum Pedicures:

  • 🌹 Rose
  • 🌺 Lavender
  • 🥛 Milk & Honey Pearl
  • 🌼 Jasmine
  • 🌳 Aloe Vera + Hemp
  • 🍃 Green Tea & Mint
Diamond Indulgence Pedicure
$75

The perfect treatment for silky smooth, refreshed, and revitalized feet. Experience all the benefits of our Essential Pedicure, elevated with a relaxing citrus and sea salt soak to detoxify and soften, expert callus care, and a gentle sugar scrub to reveal glowing skin. Hydrate deeply with a collagen-infused masque and nourishing paraffin wax, then unwind with a 20-minute massage featuring hot stone therapy, serum oil, and buttery cream to lock in moisture.

La Jolla Shores Royal Pedicure
$85

Pamper your feet with this luxurious anti-aging pedicure, including all the benefits of our Essential Pedicure plus premium upgrades. Begin with a relaxing citrus and sea salt soak enhanced by a rose bath bomb, releasing a calming aroma and softening the skin. Follow with expert callus care and a sugar scrub to smooth and refresh. Replenish moisture with a collagen masque for elasticity and glow. Enjoy a 20-minute massage with vegan aromatic candle oil to deeply hydrate and provide soothing warmth, combined with hot stone therapy and serum oil for ultimate relaxation. Finish with buttery cream and paraffin wax to lock in hydration, leaving your feet silky smooth and radiant

Beverages

At La Jolla Shores Nails & Spa, we believe in pampering you beyond our services. Enjoy complimentary beverages during your visit.

Note: Alcoholic beverages are offered as a special treat to guests aged 21 and older, with a limit of one serving per visit.

For Services Over $20:
  • Bottled Water (Still or Sparkling)
  • Juice Boxes
  • Green Tea
  • Soda
For Services Over $50
  • Cabernet Sauvignon
  • Merlot
  • Pinot Grigio
  • Sauvignon Blanc
  • Chardonnay
  • White Zinfandel
  • Blue Moon Belgian White
  • Coors Light
  • Heineken
  • Corona Light/Extra
  • Starbucks Vanilla Frappuccino
  • Sparkling Juices

THANK YOU FOR CHOOSING US!

We truly appreciate your trust and support. Your satisfaction and comfort are our top priorities.

• Prices may vary depending on design and length to suit your preferences.

• Appointments are highly recommended to ensure availability, but walk-ins are welcome based on availability.

• Please arrive on time. If you’re more than 10 minutes late, we may need to adjust or reschedule your service.

• If you are not satisfied with your service, let us know before you leave, and we will do our best to make it right.

• All services are final once you leave the salon.

• For your safety, please inform us of any health conditions, allergies, or infections prior to your service.

• Please keep your valuables with you. We are not responsible for lost or damaged items.

• Gift cards are non-refundable, cannot be exchanged for cash, and must be presented at the time of service.

Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to pamper you! We look forward to seeing you again soon.
